A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: 1 star for the visuals\, a half star because it's  star wars movie. And that is about the only good thing i can say about this movie. RJ didn't see any of the OT and Luke Skywalker isn't luke Skywalker. They used the people from the OT to draw us old fans in\, but then they deliver this heap of garbage. They should've gone with something totally new in a different era in the universe.
